name: Super Shooter Bullet
description:
[Profile]

It is a first-person shooting game, where you can control the time.
If you stand still, the game proceeds in slow motion, and you can see bullets’trajectory in the air.

Once you start to move, time will be speeded and velocity of all the objects return to normal.
Be a good master of your time, and avoid being shot.

So, dare you make a direct confrontation with time?

[Play instruction]

While playing, if you notice enemies, you can choose to stand still and shoot supershot.Slowmo shooter who are confident in shooting skills can also shoot while moving.
There can be a situation when you run out of your ammunition. You can refund it by killing enemies.
Defeating enemies one by one is the key to success.
